synq_key.name: Synq Key
synq_key.description: Your Synq key from the Multisynq platform (required) https://startsynqing.com/

wallet_address.name: Wallet Address
wallet_address.description: Your wallet address for receiving rewards (required)

lite_mode.name: Lite Mode
lite_mode.description: Lite mode disables the stats server, running only the synchronizer. Use this if you need to save resources.
